title: Patch Notes
content: smatch error appearing on the launcher in a case where it shouldn't. Fixed some lighting bugs on split screen related to how in-game light was showing up in cinematics and in different locations. Fixed an issue where when a local player would drop into the game, the lighting would fade in very slowly for them. This was apparent in the Shadow-Cursed Lands, which resulted in washed-out colours for a few seconds after joining. Prevented Movement from being consumed when you enter Turn-Based Mode on
